item.title: Installing Ubuntu in NVidia Optimus / Prime Laptop - Acer Nitro 5
item.description: So.. yeah. You are probably here, pissed off, angry at your NVidia Prime / Optimus Laptop because - It does not allow you to even Try Ubuntu/Kubuntu because it freezes - It throws “dell smbios unable to tun on non dell system for installing” - You installed Ubuntu/Kubuntu directly by clicking on Install Ubuntu/Kubuntu - but it does not start - You installed Ubuntu/Kubuntu directly by clicking on Install Ubuntu/Kubuntu - but when you login, it shows a black screen with plasma icon, and freezes
